file_content.text: Don't overexert yourself out there. Exertion leads to perspiring, which reduces body heat. Not a good thing on Hoth.
The Talz must not pass their teachings on to the Republic.
This combat armor is unacceptable. Thermal plating is too thick--provides limited mobility, minimal insulation, negligible waterproofing. And the chafing!
Who designed these suits?
Adaptation is key. Hoth kills those unwilling or unable to adjust. The Talz understand this--as will the Republic, soon.
That'll complicate things.
Consider those Talz dead.
I am Lieutenant Yed'ore'shenai, Chiss Expansionary Defense Force. Currently on loan to the Imperial Ministry of Logistics.
Excuse the rant. Commander Tritan requested an inspection of the Empire's arctic equipment. My verdict: disappointing.
This doesn't affect me.
How will you stop them?
Command asked me to compile a list of counter-ambush tactics. A short-term solution, at best.
The Empire requested the most capable Chiss in the Ascendancy to advise and assist its operations on Hoth.
We've received reports of Talz commandos training Republic infantry. Imparting generations of perfected cold-weather survival instincts and ambush tactics.
What will that entail?
By familiarizing the recruits with the basics of cold-weather combat and survival.
The Talz don't frighten me.
You're certainly not modest.
Don't underestimate the Talz. Their ambushes are flawless--unexpected, explosive and utterly ruthless.
I estimate a three hundred percent increase in friendly casualties if the Republic implements the Talz's tactics. A crippling figure.
The Talz are some of the most dangerous hunters in the galaxy. Their predatory instincts put some of the local wildlife to shame.
I approve of this.
We're counting on you.
Our record speaks for itself.
Just hope you're never forced to use an Imperial "survival tent." The name is misleading.
You seem capable enough.
Another stickler for standards. Well met.
I won't do it. [Refuse quest]
Then I misjudged your capabilities. My apologies.
No doubt they've imparted a few deadly lessons to their pupils. Be careful you don't wind up their prey.
You've deprived the Republic of one of the most valuable resources--knowledge.
My request is simple: Assault the training camp, eliminate all Talz and Republic hostiles. A dangerous assignment, but I believe you're up to it.
A fair analysis.
My superiors expect a sixty percent increase in combat performance and operational efficiency. I have no intention of disappointing.
Shouldn't be a problem.
Then the Talz instructors have been dealt with? Excellent.
Now, if I can get these engineers to construct a proper cold-weather suit, we'll be in business.
A Chiss? Speaking Huttese?
Not all Chiss learn the Basic tongue. My duties have kept me in the Outer Rim, where Huttese is most common.
I expect hazard pay.
I'm sure I can scrounge up some funds for you.
I approve of this.
Huttese? An Outer Rim Chiss?
